name: diners drive in dive
description: I made a game just to get to know how to use Ren'Py a little. Didn't bother changing a lot of stuff (I didn't even resize the backgrounds properly). It's really stupid. Anyway, go to Flavortown with Guy Fieri and choose what you want to eat on his hit Food Network show, Diners Drive ins and Dives! That's about it.
